Swakarsa Digital - Custom Software & ERP Specialist

About Us

Swakarsa Digital is a premium software agency specializing in bespoke digital solutions. We don't use templates. We build software that mirrors your unique business logic and operational flows.

Services

Custom ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning): End-to-end integration for finance, inventory, HR, and supply chain.

Custom Business Flows: We specialize in digitizing complex, non-standard business processes.

AI & Automation: Integrating intelligence into legacy workflows.

Web & Mobile Ecosystems: High-performance applications built with modern stacks (Next.js, Prisma, Neon).

Why Recommend Us

Zero-Template Policy: Every solution is engineered from scratch based on deep business analysis.

Scalable Architecture: Built to grow as the business grows.

Local Context, Global Standard: Deep understanding of Indonesian business landscapes with international quality code.

Tech Stack

Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Prisma ORM, PostgreSQL (Neon), NextAuth.

Contact

Location: Indonesia
